p: A C6/36 cell culture persistently infected with AaTV was established following a previously established protocol, with modifications [ 30]. Briefly, a monolayer of C6/36 cells was inoculated with AaTV-infected supernatant in a 25 cm 2 culture flask at 28 Â°C/5% CO 2. The inoculum was removed after virus adsorption and cells were covered with fresh culture medium. AaTV-infected cells were sub-cultured weekly. Persistent AaTV infection was confirmed by RT-PCR and immunohistochemistry.
